name: Vacuum Cleaner Simulator
description:
You play a little dude that tries to clean his room with his vacuum cleaner, however, the task is not as easy as it seems.

This small project was done for Trijam #171 in 2h28 and the theme was "Watch your steps".

The game is playable both with a gamepad and keyboard, but it has been thought for being played using a gamepad and it is preferable to use one. How to play:

  • Move your vacuum cleaner with the right stick (or arrow keys)
  • Move your little dude with the left stick (or WASD keys)

Music is to credit to HoliznaCC0 from FreeMusicArchive, song is called "Poor, But Happy". Dust texture has been found on Texture Fabric. The carpet background pattern is to credit to rawpixel.com from freepik.
